``` {r num1}

vectorA <- c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
matrixA <- matrix(0, nrow = 5, ncol = 5)
print(matrixA)

for (i in 1:5) {
  for (j in 1:5) {
    matrixA[i, j] <- abs(vectorA[i] - vectorA[j])
  }
}

print(matrixA)

```
``` {r num2}
num_lines <- 5

for (i in 1:num_lines) {
  for (j in 1:i) {
    cat("*")
  }
  cat("\n")
}

```

``` {r num3}
input_number <- as.numeric(readline("Enter a number to start the Fibonacci sequence: "))

assume_number <- 0
a <- 0
b <- 1

repeat {

  if (a > 500) {
    break
  }
  

  if (a >= assume_number) {
    cat(a, " ")
  }
  
  temp <- a + b
  a <- b
  b <- temp
}

cat("\n")

```
